MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G69 area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:49pm. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the Barrachnie substation to investigate the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:49pm on Wednesday, 18 November 2020
